introduceSection2.content1: Challenge the best players worldwide with our unique daily tournament system and become the Number One! Do you have what it takes to rise to the challenge?
introduceSection2.content2: Play with anyone around the world in real-time by sharing a unique link. With just one click, you'll be connected.
introduceSection2.content3: The more you play, the more in-game coins you earn. You can use these coins to get unique avatars and emojis to communicate with your opponents.
introduceSection2.content4: Befriend your comrades and friends. Chat and challenge each other after stressful hours of work or study. Bring joy and excitement into your day.

ticTacToe.description: A strategy game where players take turns marking 'X' or 'O' in empty cells on the board. The goal is to align 3 of your symbols horizontally, vertically, or diagonally before your opponent. The game ends when someone wins or when all cells are filled with no winner.

fifteenPuzzle.description: A puzzle game played on a 4x4 board with 15 numbered tiles from 1 to 15 and one empty slot. Players move tiles by sliding them into the empty slot to arrange the numbers sequentially from 1 to 15. This game enhances logical thinking and problem-solving skills.

memory.description: A memory-testing game where players take turns flipping two cards. If they match, the player scores and continues; if not, the cards are flipped back over. The objective is to find all matching pairs.

account.title: My Account
account.deleteAccountDescription: Deleting your account will permanently erase your account, games, and rankings. This action cannot be undone.

ticTacToe.objectiveContent: Align 3 of your symbols (X or O) consecutively in a row, column, or diagonal on the board.
ticTacToe.instructionsContent: Two players take turns marking their symbols in empty cells on the board. The first player to align 3 symbols consecutively wins. If all cells are filled with no winner, the game is a draw.

fifteenPuzzle.objectiveContent: Arrange the numbered tiles from 1 to 15 in order from left to right, top to bottom on a 4x4 board, leaving the last slot empty.
fifteenPuzzle.instructionsContent: The board has 16 tiles, including one empty slot. Players can slide adjacent tiles into the empty slot. The goal is to rearrange the tiles in the correct order.

memory.objectiveContent: Find all pairs of matching images on the board.
memory.instructionsContent: The board contains a set of face-down cards with images. Players flip two cards per turn. If they match, the cards remain flipped; otherwise, they are flipped back. Continue until all pairs are found.
